text: The Deception is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe DeceptionThe Deception and stars Herbert Yost, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Herbert Yost (also credited Barry O'Moore) as Harvey Colton * Florence Lawrence as Mabel Colton * Linda Arvidson * Adele DeGarde as At Laundry * Anita Hendrie as At Laundry * Charles Inslee as Landlord * Arthur V. Johnson as Man in Top Hat / Rich Patron's Secretary * Min Johnson as At Laundry * David Miles as At Laundry / At Conservatory * Owen Moore as Rich Patron * Mack Sennett as Doctor * Harry Solter as Harvey's Friend * Dorothy West as At Laundry ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Deception (movie)
